repos_data.description: CLI tool and python library that converts the output of popular command-line tools, file-types, and common strings to JSON, YAML, or Dictionaries. This allows piping of output to tools like jq and simplifying automation scripts.
Laravel Serializable Closure provides an easy and secure way to serialize closures in PHP.
stokado can proxy objects of any storage-like, providing getter/setter syntax sugars, serialization, subscription listening, expiration setting, one-time value retrieval.
zsv+lib: tabular data swiss-army knife CLI + world's fastest (simd) CSV parser
